info.brief_description: A teen wakes up in a strange land where he is 20 foot giant and is growing bigger!
info.description:
This story is pure, erotic fiction.

Our nameless hero, if set by normal size standards, would be about 5' 3", 13-14 years of age, and weigh in around 100 pounds or so. Being of increased stature, he is, of course, much larger and will continue to grow throughout the story. Short, blonde hair, blue eyes, very tanned skin, like he was a beach kid.

At first, he will be slightly scared, in awe of his new size, and eventually playful. But with all young boys, horomones will begin to surge through his body, and he'll soon begin to realize that people can't stop him from doing anything that he pleases. And as he grows bigger, he can do more and more, eventually only caring about satisfying his sexual appetites.

         He will be the only giant.

         The growth will be slow, a relative foot or so per hour. Though he can grow faster whenever he orgasms.
         Clothes won't grow with him. He'll start out wearing sandals and swim trunks, but after tearing out of those, he'll have to wear only what he can find.
         He can use anyone he finds, boys and girls his own age, or people up to age 40.
         No violent giants, please. Though he can accidently kill people (i.e. stepping on those he doesn't see, crushing people as he grows bigger, eating someone because he's too hungry to stop, etc.).

Other than that, have fun and enjoy!
